name: auth0-log-extension-tools
description: A set of tools for logging

scripts.release: git tag $npm_package_version && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.test: npm run test:pre && cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc mocha tests/mocha.js ./tests/**/*.tests.js
scripts.test:watch: npm run test:pre && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha tests/mocha.js ./tests/**/*.tests.js --watch

author: Auth0
